entries.meaning: (uncountable, music) The arrangement of music for performance by an orchestra.
(countable, music) A composition that has been orchestrated.
(uncountable, by extension) The control of diverse elements.
examples: It’s “The Most Dangerous Game” by way of The Running Man and Battle Royale, with touches of Survivor and the mass-scale orchestration of The Truman Show.

entries.meaning: (uncountable, by extension, computing)  The automated arrangement, coordination, and management of computer systems, middleware, and services.
